introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to SmartSpend. By using our application, you accept these terms of service. SmartSpend is a personal finance management application designed to help you track your expenses, income, and budgets.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: You can use SmartSpend in two modes:
accounts.guestDescription: Your data is stored locally on your device. No account required.
accounts.cloudDescription: By creating an account, your data syncs with our servers using Supabase. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account.

subscription.title: Subscriptions and Payments
subscription.content: SmartSpend offers an optional Pro subscription that unlocks premium features. Payments are processed securely through RevenueCat and app stores (App Store, Google Play). Subscriptions automatically renew unless you cancel before the renewal date. You can manage your subscription from your app store account settings.

ownership.title: Data Ownership
ownership.content: All your financial data belongs to you. SmartSpend does not share, sell, or use your data for advertising. You can export or delete your data at any time from the app settings.

use.title: Acceptable Use
use.content: By using SmartSpend, you agree to:

rules.legal: Use the app only for legal and personal purposes
rules.noAccess: Not attempt to access other users' data
rules.noModify: Not modify, copy, or distribute the app without authorization
rules.noDamage: Not use the app in a way that could damage or disrupt the service

limitations.title: Limitation of Liability
limitations.content: SmartSpend is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not responsible for financial losses, damages, or inaccuracies in the data. It is your responsibility to verify the accuracy of your financial records and perform regular backups of your data.

availability.title: Service Availability
availability.content: We make our best effort to keep SmartSpend available, but we do not guarantee 100% uptime. We may suspend or discontinue the service at any time with prior notice.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an update date. Your continued use of SmartSpend after changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At SmartSpend, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.intro: Depending on the mode you use, we collect:

guestItems.localStorage: Data is stored locally on your device
guestItems.noServer: No information is sent to our servers

cloudItems.email: Email and name (provided when registering or using OAuth)
cloudItems.financial: Financial data: transactions, categories, budgets, trips

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.intro: We use your information exclusively to:

items.sync: Sync your data across devices (cloud mode)
items.auth: Authenticate your identity and keep your account secure

usage.noSell: ‚ùå We do NOT sell, share, or use your data for advertising

items.supabase: Supabase: Secure platform with encryption in transit (HTTPS/TLS)
items.rls: Row Level Security (RLS): Only you can access your data
items.oauth: OAuth Authentication: We don't store passwords in plain text
items.backups: Encrypted backups: Local backups use SHA-256 checksum

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.revenuecatDesc: Subscription and payment management. RevenueCat processes purchase information but does not have access to your personal financial data.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your data while you maintain an active account or as necessary to provide you services. You can delete your account and all your data at any time from the app settings. Guest mode data only exists on your device and is deleted when you clear browser data.

items.access: Access: View all your stored data
items.export: Export: Download your data in JSON or CSV format
items.rectify: Rectify: Edit or correct your data
items.delete: Delete: Erase your account and all your data
items.portability: Portability: Transfer your data to another service
items.object: Object: Reject certain uses of your data

cookies.title: Cookies and Local Storage
cookies.content: SmartSpend uses browser localStorage to store your preferences (language, theme, currency) and financial data (in guest mode). We do not use advertising tracking cookies. Authentication sessions are managed through secure Supabase tokens.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: SmartSpend is not directed at children under 13 years old. We do not intentionally collect information from children. If you discover that a minor has provided personal data, contact us to delete it.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes through a notice in the app. The "last updated" date at the top of this page indicates when it was last modified.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, contact us:
